WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I am working on a project at the moment and we had signed all of our assemblies. We required to mover over to the PCL version of MVVM Light but the assembly is not signed which causes build errors. Would it be possible to have an SNK added to this assembly please?


Thanks

Comments.Message:
Just spotted this after posting: https://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/discussions/549725

Let me know if you get this resolved...
